scripts.bundle-all: sencha --cwd app app build --clean --production && electron-packager app/build/production/App App --all --out build/electron
scripts.bundle-win32: sencha --cwd app app build --clean --production && electron-packager app/build/production/App App --platform=windows --arch=32 --version=1.4.7 --out build/electron
scripts.bundle-win64: sencha --cwd app app build --clean --production && electron-packager app/build/production/App App --platform=windows --arch=64 --version=1.4.7 --out build/electron
scripts.bundle-osx: sencha --cwd app app build --clean --production && electron-packager app/build/production/App App --platform=darwin --version=1.4.7 --out build/electron
scripts.bundle-linux32: sencha --cwd app app build --clean --production && electron-packager app/build/production/App App --platform=linux --arch=x86 --version=1.4.7 --out build/electron
scripts.bundle-linux64: sencha --cwd app app build --clean --production && electron-packager app/build/production/App App --platform=linux --arch=x86_64 --version=1.4.7 --out build/electron
scripts.clean: rm -rf ext; rm -rf .sencha; rm -rf app/.sencha; rm -rf node_modules; rm -rf app/node_modules; rm -rf build
